The goal with this package is to provide sample, fast and flexible methods for processing, analysis and visualization of spatially resolved transcriptomics data. Currently, the package only supports [Seurat](https://satijalab.org/seurat/) objects.

## Installation

`semla` is currently only available as a development version on GitHub:

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("ludvigla/semla")
```

Load library

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(semla)
packageVersion("semla")
```
